Play with friends and you're more than likely going to have a lot of fun whether you win or lose. Playing with friends also can help you tolerate the bugs and constant Invite Simulator that is DBD matchmaking. But without them? Not so much. Why? Because very few online players you meet will actually try help you if you get caught at least from my experience and even worse, will make you do all the work getting the generators only to watch you get caught and escape for themselves without doing anything. Kinda defeats the purpose of a Co-op game if there is no cooperation. Also I just want to say that I don't get how this game is meant to be played for beginners. You can't outrun the killer, you can't hide. You literally just keep getting knifed down and hoping you might get saved. Again, this is just my personal opinion. I will still play the game and keep learning the tricks of the trade. But if you're someone new to DBD without friends i'd steer clear for that main reason alone.

I really not understand your point.
Firstly, Dead by daylight is a wonderful game, even tough it sucks pretty often, but I would like to recommend it.

But well, with the new patch, I cant.
Dead by daylight has no Goal. Normally, the goal of a game would be to get more people to play it, make that the old and the new players are having fun and balancing so nothing is really OP more very weak.

Firstly they get many new player to play this, obviously.

Second, oh boi, what are you doing?
I want to speak directly to the devs now: A Game needs a skillcap. A skillcap so high that you need hundreds of hours to get it all, the new patch is garbage, removing the difficulty in flashlight und pallet saves is a really really bad idea because not only you are removing a high risk, high reward thing from the game (wasted pallet or wasted flashlight is failed) but also, you are nerfing directly EVERY KILLER. You need to add more Stuff in order to let old players have more fun with it.
Right now its just: you go ingame and do gens or you pallet loop the killer. If you know where every pallet is and if your team saves you, you wont need ANY jukes and with the nurse getting nerfed the last killer hasnt got a chance against it.

But actually thats the third one: Your balancing is bad. Idk whether you are only survivor mains but playing killer sucks. It really does. Killer who arent the nurse (got nerfed) havent got a that high skillcap, and with that not so many posibilitys, to stop the survivors to make gens. Hex:Ruin is a must have in order to get a high rank because without the gens are way to fast done. It was like that already before *1.9.2* but now its even worse. With getting 100%ly out of the killers grasp with a pallet or flashlight save, playing Killer doesnt just suck way more, its also very unlikly to win. It was survivor > Killer and now? Now its Survivor >>>> Killer (?!).
Playing as Survivor makes no fun too, cause of the low skillcap you can achieve.

Freddy is garbage. Why does he have a ability to hinder himself?! Whats the point of that?!?!
I got a few Ideas to change it, but I cant change the fact that killer are much weaker then 4 survivor and the amount of 100% pallet and flashlight saves they have.

Pls devs, balance Killer and survivor and bring me my skillcap back. 360s were so hard to make but so rewarding and you made letherface, the pig, and freddy. Every time I did a flashlight save or a pallet save I was feeling so good but now its so unstatisfying. Every time a did a 3 or 4 K at high rank I was so proud of me, but thats not possible anymore and trying it sucks so hard.
STOP IT.

If the game ever gets his old spirit again I will highly recommend it. Its a nice game with many nice people a very good game idea but sadly a not so good evolution. i dont get the point of making the game less fun for older player to "balance" it.
